name: BeanMachine (BETA)
description: This is my first game and I would love for this community to tell me bugs you find and anything else you think I should add/do! Please keep in mind this Game is still in BETA updates will be made about every 3-4 weeks (sometimes randomly if its urgent)!! You play as a basic bean and try to be the Bean with the most kills!! LET THE BEST BEAN WIN!!!!!!
